meanings.definition: A person or business that sells goods from a particular brand or manufacturer.
meanings.sent1: The local stockists of the famous brand displayed the new collection in their store window.
meanings.sent2: I always buy my favorite brand's products from the stockists near my house.
meanings.sent3: The stockists threw a party to celebrate the arrival of the latest merchandise.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of options, the stockists stood out like a shining beacon of quality.
meanings.sent5: The stockists' shelves were overflowing with the latest items, tempting customers to browse for hours.

meanings.definition: A retailer that carries a specific product or line of products.
meanings.sent1: The stockists in the mall had a wide selection of the popular product.
meanings.sent2: I visited the stockists to purchase the limited edition item.
meanings.sent3: The stockists organized a special sale to attract more customers.
meanings.sent4: The stockists were like treasure hunters, always seeking the best products to offer.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the stockists' shop felt like stepping into a wonderland of unique finds.
